description: The Legend of Zelda: Spirit Tracks is the train bound handheld sequel to Phantom Hourglass.
game: The Legend of Zelda - Spirit Tracks

st-v0.6.0r2.description:
### [Setup Guide](https://github.com/DayKat/spirit-tracks/blob/main/worlds/tloz_st/docs/setup.md)

### Hotifx: #9
- Fixed logic issue in ToS 2
- added bow of light to phantom logic while i was there
- skipped forest sanctuary zelda cs
- enabled rb logic for ap 6.7+
- cleaned up locations file

# Major Changes
- Added Malladus goal and a bunch of goal options
- Added Rabbitsanity 🐰 
- added the ability to change the train speed with the client command `/train`
- added a map tracker to Universal Tracker
- added some options and locations to do with train portals
- added some events to universal tracker
- added `start_with_train` option to prevent first time players getting BK:ed in outset
- re-added Stagnox HC

# Backendy stuff
- added support for Rule Builder (with backwards compatibility), coming in the next archipelago release. Allows the UT command `/explain` to work automatically
- made some code easier to work with
- added filler item handling to make sure there are enough locations for everything
- simplified some logic, and added some missing paths
- support for UT yamless

# Bugfixes
- removal of vanilla treasure is more consistent, but still not perfect
- taking the train from outset with Alfonzo is no longer an issue
- fixed Hyrule castle outdoors chest sending early
- updated some location coords
- Added safety for getting stamp book at in Niko's house
- fixed some heart container handling, still doesn't update until the next room :(
- auto-update dynamic entrances after getting outset locations, let's you leave without reloading if Alfonzo is there (still requires a reload if not to spawn Zelda)
- fixed stage being wrong from a save and quit
- fixed bizhawk running an extra cycle on disconnect, causing the item counter to reset

# Known Issues
- treasure isn't always reset properly
- heart containers don't update immediately, they will on a scene load or on opening the collection screen
- you start with a weird train
- Niko won't give you the stamp book if you have more than 5 stamps. don't collect stamps.
- grass rabbits are called forest rabbits
- bow of light is not in logic for phantom possession in tower of spirits

@carrotinator & @DayKat
st-v0.6.0r2.title: ST AP v6.0

v0.1.0.description:
Hi this is a demo version of The Legend of Zelda - Spirit Tracks as a randomiser for Archipelago.
Currently this only has 5 checks: Aboda Clearing Rocks, Aboda Bee Boy, Aboda Stamp Station, Castle Town Stamp Station, and Tower of Spirits (ToS) Forest Rail Glyph.
This means that there is limited randomisation atm.
Enjoy and please report any bugs/ideas for future things!

Big credits to @carrotinator (Phantom Hourglass ap dev) and @1313e
v0.1.0.title: Spirit Tracks AP 0.1 Demo Version

v0.2.description:
Changelog:
- added new locations throughout the Forest Realm
- can now choose from multiple goals in the yaml
- keysanity settings work

Notes:
- I was unable to get a few checks to co-operate, so to know what checks are currently in the rando, please use Universal Tracker (UT). The only check that for some reason doesn't appear on UT is Forest Temple Dungeon Reward, but that will happen automatically before the heart container chest anyway, which does show correctly
- Tower of Spirits currently only includes the 1st section
- please excuse the mixture of regional names for stations, I'll change that for next version
- to board the train in aboda/outset you will need to complete both the bee boy and rock girl checks, then go in and out of a house. If something doesn't work right 1st try then you can always try going through a loading zone
- I don't currently know how to change Link into his soldier outfit so you're stuck playing as Engineer Link for the forseeable :P
v0.2.title: ST AP 0.2 - The Forest Realm Update

v0.2.1.title: ST AP 0.2.1 - Bugfixes

v0.3.description: Honestly I worked on this a while ago, so I don't entirely remember what I changed, but essentially there are more checks in the Forest Realm now, including Rabbit Haven and the Trading Post!
v0.3.title: ST AP 0.3 - More Forest Realm Checks

v0.3.1.description:
Changes: 

- added co-ords to HC 1F Back Chest
- fixed stagnox not spawning
- zelda now doesn't appear until you have forest glyph
- "important" section added to setup instructions
v0.3.1.title: ST AP 0.3.1 - Bugfixes and setup info

v0.3.2r2.description:
- Treasures should be fixed (there are still some plain "Treasure" items in the pool in place of stamps)
- heart containers now fill your health (requires going through a loading zone to change)
- removed WT heart container chest check as the game itself is borked on picking it up
- added trading post song of light statue and trading post regal ring chest checks
v0.3.2r2.title: ST AP 0.3.2 - More Bugfixes!

v0.4.description:
**Changelog**

- Added the 2nd section of the Tower of Spirits, including a new goal option
- Treasures actually work now!
- various bugfixes from previous pre-releases, plus Forest Source now gets removed properly (kinda)

**Important**
be sure to read the setup instructions' important section if you haven't before!
v0.4.title: ST AP 0.4 - More Tower of Spirits

v0.4.1.description:
I had to remove the Wooded Temple Boss Heart Container check for now as it removed life from the player (the game itself's fault).
This bugfix properly removes it
v0.4.1.title: ST AP 0.4.1 - Heart Container Bugfix

v0.5.description:
Added Snow Realm checks!

- Source items now give post-dungeon tracks with them.
- Added misc tracks in both Forest Realm and Snow Realm

glhf
v0.5.title: ST AP 0.5 - The Chilly Update

v0.5.1.description:
This update was more or less entirely made by @carrotinator 
Changelog:

- changed some logic bits
- added a missing chest location in Blizzard temple
- set new getting_location variable, cause the old one would finish before you got the item if you spammed through text
- removed rupoor from filler item list
- added wt poison spots to hard logic, along with castle town cucco locations without song of birds
- apparently north icy spring rail lets you get to slippery station without snow source. added to logic
- added dynaflag for anjean kicking you out after ocean glyph
- fixed alfonzo outset crash
- apparently alfonzo needing a reload to spawn in castle town was due to zelda text, that fixed itself!
- changed niko stamp book to an address read cause it triggered on new game with the new getting_location variable (this means that it will still send if you get stamp book in room, from start items or multiworld)
- apparently the flag for entering the first portal was wrong? fixed it
- savewarping in tower of spirits puts you in room 0x79FF. if you enter that room, the client will change your room to 0x1401 and everything works fine
- added dynaflag to allow entering snow realm with snow source but without blizzard temple tracks. super cursed snow realm unlocked! it was probably the blizzard that didn't like being deactivated without it's tracks
v0.5.1.title: ST AP 0.5.1 - Post Snow addition fixes
